personDataRelation: start p=node({id}) match (p)-[r]->(n) where type(r) IN ['born_in', 'born_on', 'dead_on'] return n
personParents: start p=node({id}) match (p)-[r]->(n) where type(r) IN ['child_of'] return n
personPartners: start p=node({id}) match (p)-[r]->(n) where type(r) IN ['partner_of'] return n
